version-warning: AI an horar da shi akan <tooltip>sabanin sigar wannan littafi</tooltip>. Har yanzu zaka iya amfani da {feature} amma sakamakon na iya zama dan bambanta.

coming-soon.title: Da zuwa

search.description: Binciken AI yana samun haɗuwa mafi kusa ko ba ku san ainihin jumlar ba.

chat.empty-state: Yi amfani da ƙarfin AI don bincika cikin littafin, fara da rubuta abin da kake nema...
chat.copied: An kwafi zuwa allo mai kwakwalwa!
chat.error: Wani abu ya faru ba daidai ba. <retry>Sake gwadawa</retry> ko <contact>saduwa damu</contact> idan ya ci gaba.

external-book.title: Labarai masu dadi!
external-book.description: Wannan littafin baya nan a Usul amma mun samu wani sigar a wani wuri.
